Skills

Angular
Looking to bring some pizazz to your site..we can do that too! Well skilled not just in Angular, but the important parts of RxJS and NGRX so that your app can run smoothly while receiving copious amounts of data.

Ionic
If you are looking to ship to Android and iOS then look no further. Ionic is hybrid mobile development framework that we can use to help get you up and running on both systems.

Firebase..the new frontier
These days everyone is talking serverless..dont get left behind. See how we can get you up to speed, with the latest offering of Googles Firebase.
